Texts.Chs: 一本类似于小说的东西，用晶体墨水蚀刻在令人惊讶的磨砂纸页上，纸页也是由晶体构成的。它详细描述了一个叫叶蒂卡什·贾斯特里瓦尔的人的旅行和审度，他是加里克斯部落的英雄。他似乎是厄休安龙人历史上的一个重要人物。
Texts.Eng: A novel of sorts, etched in crystalline ink on amazingly honed pages, also formed from crystals. It details the travels and trials of one Yettikash Justiri'var, hero of the Garix Clan. It seems he was a figure of historical significance in Eld'uukharic history.
